entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • mac m1 using System.Data.Odbc on .net 7 (core) #88007
  • Intrinsics for generic math #88005
  • Add non extended connect support to http/2 #88003
  • Cannot create a CancellationTokenSource with an infinite delay with TimeProvider that is not TimeProvider.System #88000
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator outerloop test failure #87999
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Text.Json built-in support for more numeric types #87994
    8.0.0

Closed

  • DateTimeOffset does not parse a valid ISO-8601 datetime string #51740
    Future
  • Redundant code is generated when marshalling `Span<T>` or `ReadOnlySpan<T>` #88002
  • System.Text.Json support for Int128 and UInt128 #73500
    Future
  • System.Text.Json incorrectly serializes Half (float16) type #81970
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add BigInteger support to System.Text.Json #60780
    Future
  • RFC4122 compatible binary representation for GUID #53354
    Future
  • Test failure baseservices/compilerservices/UnsafeAccessors/UnsafeAccessorsTests/UnsafeAccessorsTests.sh #87760
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Added ArrayBufferWriter<T>.ResetWrittenCount() #88009
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Introduce DOTNET_JITAllowOptionalRelocs #88008
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added Utf8.IsValid(bytes) #88004
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix incorrect sequence number used in NTLM signature calculation #87998
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize aggregate info iteration in physical promotion #87997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #87993
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range initialization, take 2 #87992
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution

Merged

  • Auto generate Event Ids in the logging source gen #87892
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Fix invalid datetimeoffset parsing #87801
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Add ConfigurationExtensions tests to NativeAOT exclusions #87955
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix UnsafeAccessors with Relocs #87986
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: don't set edge weights to zero for inconsistent profiles #87947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use config binding generator in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Configuration assembly #87935
    area-Extensions-Logging, source-generator, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [HTTP/3] Fix handling cancelation during QUIC connection establishment #87971
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Document new STJ diagnostics and fix diagnostic id conflicts. #87980
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion #87917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop setting class handles for promoted parameter SIMD fields #87967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2208715 #87991
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Fixing a concurrency bug in ManagedWebSocket which may cause memory corruption #87966
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema and output layout #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Type equivalence support in Crossgen2 #87899
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Complete interp PackedSimd support and expand jiterp support #87903
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
